mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (price, accountId, productName, productStatus, createDate, updateDate, deliveryCharge, reviewCount, totalStarRating, productQuantity, purchaseCount) VALUES (#{price}, #{accountId}, #{productName}, #{productStatus}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deliveryCharge}, #{reviewCount}, #{totalStarRating}, #{productQuantity}, #{purchaseCount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product WHERE accountId = #{accountId} AND productStatus != 'DELETED'
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET price = #{price}, productName = #{productName}, productStatus = #{productStatus}, updateDate = #{updateDate}, deliveryCharge = #{deliveryCharge}, reviewCount = #{reviewCount}, totalStarRating = #{totalStarRating}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, productQuantity = #{productQuantity}, purchaseCount = #{purchaseCount} WHERE productId = #{productId} AND accountId = #{accountId}
